column4: hello everybody. i have two pcs on wich i use ubuntu, and one "server" with some debian on it. i want to have the firefox bookmarks of both pcs synchronized. is there a possibility to have the bookmarks saved at the server, maybe in an sql database or something, so both pcs cann access them (and update them automaticall, e.g. read them while starting forefox)?
There are a... errr grawity answered it for you.
It's a Firefox addon you're looking for -- a bookmarking sync addon.
sounds good. thank you very much
